name: api
description: API for nftstorage.link IPFS edge gateway

scripts.test: npm run test:setup && npm run test:worker && npm run test:teardown
scripts.test:setup: npm run build && npm run docker:start
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:db:start && npm run docker:ipfs:start
scripts.docker:stop: npm run docker:db:stop && npm run docker:ipfs:stop
scripts.docker:db:start: node scripts/cli.js db --start && node scripts/cli.js db-sql --cargo --testing --reset

author: Vasco Santos <santos.vasco10@gmail.com>
